alert.note: Alert for Collier; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:28PM EDT until July 13 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Collier County in southwestern Florida... Northern Mainland Monroe County in southwestern Florida... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 327 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Carnestown, or 9 miles northeast of Chokoloskee, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chokoloskee, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Carnestown and Copeland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
